markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Fear effects evoke the emotion of fear. Effects with this trait always have the [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) and [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) traits as well.
name: Fear
